subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: New RS Radios that dont Click when hacked
author: psfponies
full_text:
--0-33926492-1207704903=:77342
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

I went by Radio Shack on my way home and picked up a 12-820 arm band radio does anyone know how to hack it? 
   
  I saw lots of 12-469's on the shelf and tons of the new all black 12-470's I asked to guy if they had any of the older 12-470's no such luck. 
   
  So from what I hear no one has been able to hack the new 12-470? Has anyone here tried? 
   
  Kay

itcdeadpeople <ITCdeadpeople@...> wrote:
  You probably won't find any of the 470's Kay, but always good to keep an eye out. As for 
clicking, I think only the new 469 does that. If you try the 820, please let us know how you 
like it. 

Margaret

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "psfponies" 
wrote:
>
> I am thinking about trying another RS radio and I am wondering which 
> ones dont have the annoying clicking when hacked. I believe someone 
> said the 12-820 arm band radio didnt click. Also I will need the 
> instuctions on how to hack this one if anyone has it.
> 
> I am going to go to a couple of the older Radio shacks in my area and 
> see if they have any of the older 469 and 470's.
> 
> Thanks
> Kay
>
